All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CalendarFXController
 
CryptographyHelper
Utility class for cryptographic operations such as generating salt, hashing passwords, and verifying hashed passwords.
DatabaseConnection
Utility class for managing the database connection and initializing the database schema.
EntryDAOInterface
Interface for managing entry-related operations.
HelloApplication
Main application class for launching the JavaFX application.
HelloController
Controller class for handling user interactions on the login screen.
MainController
Controller class for handling user interactions on the main application screen.
MockEntryDao
Mock implementation of the EntryDAOInterface.
MockUserDAO
Mock implementation of the UserDAOInterface for testing purposes.
PopUp
Utility class for displaying a pop-up message in a JavaFX application.
SceneHelper
Utility class for managing scene transitions in a JavaFX application.
SettingsController
 
SignupController
Controller class for handling user interactions on the sign-up page.
SqliteEntryDAO
Implementation of the EntryDAOInterface for SQLite database.
SqliteUserDAO
Implementation of the UserDAOInterface for SQLite database.

TimerController
Controller class for managing the timer functionality.
UserAccount
Represents a user account with a username and password.
